question: Ecological pyramid of energy or productivity is â€“
option2:
Always inverted
Can be upright or inverted
Can take any form like food web
Always inverted
Can be upright or inverted
Can take any form like food web
Always inverted
option4: Can take any form like food web
explanation: Ecological pyramid of Energy or Productivity shows the movement of energy from one trophic level to another. It is always upright as energy is lost from the lower trophic level to higher trophic level.
